Title: Woman of Rome
Writer: Alberto Moravia (novel), Alberto Moravia (screenplay), Giorgio Bassani (screenplay), Luigi Zampa (screenplay), Ennio Flaiano (screenplay)
Actors: Gina Lollobrigida, Daniel Gélin, Franco Fabrizi, Raymond Pellegrin
Plot: During the fascist era, Adriana a beautiful young model, becomes a prostitute after a love affair gone wrong. She meets Mino, a partisan who falls in love with her and wants to redeem her.
